RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see [What is RuqES?](https://ruqqus.com/post/ldx/what-is-ruqes) or +RuqES. --- --- I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end. --- * Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". [image source](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqie/post/5xhz/ruqqie-reaction-gifs) * Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts). * Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). `Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Comments` 🠖 `Reveal blocked comment button`
![](https://i.ibb.co/J7zjSSh/Peek-2021-01-03-18-17-ruqqes-reveal-blocked-comment.gif) * Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup. * Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up. --- * Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author. * Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply. * Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload. * Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time. --- If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, **backup your data regularly**!
`Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Settings` 🠖 `Export` --- (Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.) Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit... I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying [saidit](https://saidit.net) and possibly [poal](https://poal.co), maybe I'll see you there. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
body_html:
RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see What is RuqES? or +RuqES.

I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end.

  • Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". image source
  • Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts).
  • Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Comments 🠖 Reveal blocked comment button
  • Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup.
  • Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up.
  • Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author.
  • Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply.
  • Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload.
  • Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time.

If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, backup your data regularly!
Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Settings 🠖 Export

(Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.)

Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), I wrote a comment about that problem recently (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit...

I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying saidit and possibly poal, maybe I'll see you there.

To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before):

  • I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and all shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. this one)
  • I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a wallpaper and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe).
  • I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive...

Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English.

I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform.

See you, internet cowboys.

I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)

Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)

  • Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload.

Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Settings 🠖 Export

(Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.)

Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), I wrote a comment about that problem recently (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit...

I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying saidit and possibly poal, maybe I'll see you there.

To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before):

  • I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and all shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. this one)
  • I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a wallpaper and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe).
  • I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive...

Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English.

I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform.

See you, internet cowboys.

body:
> This genuinely never happened, kek was in the server but never encouraged anyone, thats what pissed them off so they lied about him participating.

I am pretty sure kek participated, but in the troll operation (ruqqus correction something, that with manufactured screenshots and other manipulation).

> Admins have proof he was in control of more than 10 guilds other wise they would not have temp banned him.

Have they released the proof? Couldn't it be tampered with or manufactured? Because when users start to doubt admins, now it's just a word against a word. They screwed up big just recently with censoring guilds in specific categories, before with bans for threats, now with bans for harassment and forcing categories on guilds. I am sorry, but even if they managed to fixed most of them, those massive mistakes should not have happened in a first place. Not that often and that big, and because of it they lost *my* trust.

> just means you can say the nword or fag in lounge lol.

No, it goes way beyond that. You can't post on Discord links to many posts and comments from Ruqqus (e.g. crazy conspiracy theories, stuff about jews and nazis). Or discuss any political topic which left (and some probably admins as well) deems offensive (e.g. anti-trans). I am not saying that it's much likely that I personally would post such stuff (I am pretty passive and non-confrontational), but I realized it creates a serious problem when the Discord server is an official and main way of communication for a free speech platform. At the very lest it's a clear signal "we are not committed to fully supporting free speech" (wrote more about the bubble in some other comment). They had ample time to fix it, they chose not to. If they want just a replacement for Discord, then to set up a Matrix server and web snout is not that difficult, especially if they will have much less users than on Discord. And an added bonus is, that in the future it can be fully integrated into Ruqqus itself (e.g. seamless PMs and chat).

I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). For more details see [What is RuqES?](https://ruqqus.com/post/ldx/what-is-ruqes) or +RuqES. --- --- I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end. --- * Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". [image source](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqie/post/5xhz/ruqqie-reaction-gifs) * Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts). * Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). `Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Comments` 🠖 `Reveal blocked comment button`
![](https://i.ibb.co/J7zjSSh/Peek-2021-01-03-18-17-ruqqes-reveal-blocked-comment.gif) * Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup. * Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up. --- * Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author. * Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply. * Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload. * Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time. --- If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, **backup your data regularly**!
`Main menu` 🠖 `RuqES` 🠖 `Settings` 🠖 `Export` --- (Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.) Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit... I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying [saidit](https://saidit.net) and possibly [poal](https://poal.co), maybe I'll see you there. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)
post.body_html:
RuqES is aiming at improving user experience of Ruqqus. For more details see What is RuqES? or +RuqES.

I will be taking a break from actively using Ruqqus (after I finish last Blender project). I may occasionally do some minor bug fixes in RuqES, but most likely I won't be adding any new features. See my explanation at the end.

  • Added new reaction gif ruqqie "giving crown". image source
  • Implemented category change detection (applies all modifications to newly loaded posts).
  • Implemented experimental basic revealing of blocked comments (not enabled by default). Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Comments 🠖 Reveal blocked comment button
  • Implemented lazy loading of reaction gifs popup.
  • Increased time before isDarkTheme gives up.
  • Fixed error message in image upload and reaction gif failing on comments deleted by author.
  • Fixed multiple insertion of buttons (image upload and reaction gif) in direct post reply.
  • Added more error checks to reaction gifs and comment image upload.
  • Fixed reaction gif not being inserted in empty post for first time.

If you are actively using saving of posts or comments, please, backup your data regularly!
Main menu 🠖 RuqES 🠖 Settings 🠖 Export

(Rest is just my explanation why I am going silent/low-efford on Ruqqus. There is nothing more directly related to RuqES, feel free to scroll to comments if you aren't interested.)

Reason of my decision is the bias of admins (selective rules enforcement, überusers from Discord and patrons) and repeated changes contrary to their own advertising ("without censorship", supporting free speech, admins being impartial, leaving as much as possible to community). Some of their failures were fixed (censoring uncategorized guilds, arbitrary bans for threats), others were not (forced categories). I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), I wrote a comment about that problem recently (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit...

I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying saidit and possibly poal, maybe I'll see you there.

To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before):

  • I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and all shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. this one)
  • I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a wallpaper and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe).
  • I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive...

Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English.

I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform.

See you, internet cowboys.

body:
I will confirm that is true, I got overthrown messages before my ban message. I still have it in my inbox. The guild violating accusation was completely bogus, I only ever ran 10 on this account. Any alts I had from the beginning were inactive with no rep, that aside they existed prior to that rule change (which was only changed **after** banning Klenny for it). I was in the midst of confronting that fact when they banned me for allegedly the same shit. 

I had no voice, I was banned. No statement was allowed, no chance for appeal, I had to update my guild description in +HitlerWasRight just to get the message out that it was a planned coordinated attack with admin cooperation. There's screenshots of the discord conversations [here](https://ruqqus.com/+ShillWall/post/63wm/rcp-update-concerning-the-mass-siege). 

I used this name to test the free speech claim on here, I had seen posts on Voat in the beginning that indicated they were frauds. So I came over and tried it. I was very careful not to abuse it, opting with honest debate in lieu of trolling. I was able to reach users who were honestly open minded, not the liberal version of politically correct views only. I never exiled anyone from my guilds until after the sieges. People like to talk about evil Nazis, when what I experienced was pure hypocrisy. They couldn't wait to execute what they constantly accused me of. 

Let me tell you, the **only reason I got my guilds back was because of a negative public backlash**. The admins were so corrupt, [they didn't scrutinize the cabal members until it was shoved in their face](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/63bl/alt-abuse-and-admin-actions/l5gu), and when they did the punishment wasn't nearly as strict as what they put me through. As a side note, they banned the protesters for "Targeted Harassment" after kicking multiple posts from +Ruqqus and exiling the posters. 

I will say this: You are a brave honest soul for standing up for free speech and against corruption. I don't blame you for stepping down, I applaud you for it. I've ended my contributions to this site with the category segregation (which I take full blame for them implementing) and now vote restrictions. 

Thank you for your contributions, there is need for a Voat replacement so perhaps you could look into that 😊 

I am just here now, after my commuted ban expired, to watch the ship sink. ![](https://files.catbox.moe/9gesb9.PNG)

I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), [I wrote a comment about that problem recently](https://ruqqus.com/+uslashremoved/post/695h/sfrohne-permanently-banned-for-linking-to/ly25) (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit... I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying [saidit](https://saidit.net) and possibly [poal](https://poal.co), maybe I'll see you there. To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before): * I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and *all* shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. [this one](https://i.ibb.co/GkXhJzB/canvas.png)) * I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). I tried to grow few apolitical guilds (I believe that without much better category system [quick switching between sets of categories] or multireddits/aliances, it's almost impossible currently). I created few Ruqqus-inspired pieces in Blender (each taking 1-2 work days, e.g. a [wallpaper](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/21c5/ruqqus-wallpaper-oc) and some Ruqqies in +Ruqqie), and of course created and maintained this userscript (that's at least a hundred work hours, probably much more; maintaining it over 5 months I believe). * I am not a troll. I always tried to stay positive and polite (I like non-pc/dank/dark/edgy memes and don't mind vulgarities, but I don't use them). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive... Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English. I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform. See you, internet cowboys. ![](https://i.ibb.co/TvNKmDF/sad.gif)

I dislike how unprofessionally are admins behaving - ignoring (or not even requesting) feedback from community, encouraging and participating in brigadding and trolling operations, banning people for criticism under the excuse of undefined harassment (this should be defined precisely and allowing as much as possible, same as happened to threats, or you are not a free speech platform; offended can use block) and banning (or at least threatening to ban) for off-platform behaviour (not on ruqqus.com). It looks like admins were even cooperating with a group on Discord, so that the group can steal guilds (siege with alts) within seconds after admins roll out rule changes. And using Discord instead of their own platform or at least a freespeech-supporting alternative (e.g. self-hosted Matrix), I wrote a comment about that problem recently (but I mentioned it several times before, in a span of months, I wasn't the only one). I don't want another Reddit...

I'll lurk for a while (meaning I'll stop posting and creating content, stop/limit writing of comments). Even though Ruqqus is getting worse for some time, maybe there is still a chance admins see the light. I will be trying saidit and possibly poal, maybe I'll see you there.

To prevent any rumors and mischaracterization (since I saw it done in several instances before):

  • I am not a nazi (or any other extremist). I took several tests and all shown I am pretty much just a dirty average centrist (e.g. this one)
  • I am not a shill/paid to disrupt competition. I started using Ruqqus over half a year ago and since then I posted a lot of links to videos I found interesting, majority of them apolitical (rest were about gaming and negative effects brought by mixing politics in). It was very strange to find myself in a same team (pro free speech, and against manipulation and other shenanigans of admins) as, I think, a literal nazi and a progressive...

Sorry for this wall of text and my non-native English.

I hope freedom of speech prevails - offline and online, if not here then at least on some other platform.

See you, internet cowboys.

See you, internet cowboys.
